item.title: META
item.description: score:-219 Chances: Meta stock was named a top pick by Mizuho, which is bullish on Amazon partnership driving social media e-commerce. Magnificent Seven stocks, including AI leader Nvidia, are among the best stocks to buy and watch in today’s stock market. Productivity is rebounding after 15 years of no gains.
